First-of-its kind cultural plant and land restoration practices pioneered by Peabody put Kayenta on the map and are recognized globally as a model for world-class reclamation.  Peabody views reclamation as a core value and a fundamental part of the mining process. https://t.co/87ziPc1ZVk

Agreements to restore mined lands were made with the Navajo and Hopi decades before laws were enacted that now require it.  Kayenta‚Äôs reclamation plan was approved by the Navajo Nation and Hopi Tribe and subject to additional review and approval by the U.S. Dept. of the Interior. https://t.co/jIFiOs7D05

Kayenta injected $530 million in economic benefits into the region in 2018. Mine and power plant operations provided 85% of the Hopi Tribe‚Äôs budget and over 20% of the Navajo Nation‚Äôs.  Top-paying jobs at Kayenta have been an engine for economic growth for nearly a half-century. https://t.co/VmzMbKR5vu
